statements: SELECT * FROM LiteraryEvents;
SELECT event_date, event_type, event_location, speaker_name FROM LiteraryEvents;
SELECT speaker_name, book_title FROM LiteraryEvents WHERE event_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT event_id, event_date, speaker_name FROM LiteraryEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT book_title, event_location FROM LiteraryEvents WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM LiteraryEvents WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_id ASC;
SELECT speaker_name, book_title FROM LiteraryEvents WHERE event_location = 'New York' ORDER BY speaker_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_location FROM LiteraryEvents WHERE event_type = 'Workshop' AND book_title LIKE '%Programming%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LiteraryEvents WHERE speaker_name IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith', 'Alice Johnson') ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM LiteraryEvents GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM BookEvents WHERE event_location = 'Library';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BookEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM AuthorDetails WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM BookEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BookEvents JOIN AuthorDetails ON BookEvents.event_id = AuthorDetails.author_id;
SELECT * FROM BookEvents WHERE event_location = 'New York'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM BookEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM AuthorDetails WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM BookEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM AuthorDetails ORDER BY author_name
SELECT * FROM Event WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Event WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM Author WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM Author WHERE author_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM Event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, location FROM Event WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM Author WHERE author_id = 1
SELECT book_title, author_name FROM Book INNER JOIN Author ON Book.author_id = Author.author_id
SELECT event_name, location FROM Event WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_bio FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT book_title, genre FROM books WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT book_title, author_name FROM books JOIN authors ON books.author_id = authors.author_id ORDER BY book_title ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(book_id) AS total_books FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id GROUP BY authors.author_id ORDER BY total_books DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York' OR event_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM Attendees JOIN Events ON Attendees.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE Events.event_name = 'Book Launch';
SELECT * FROM Events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_location='New York'
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS attendee_count FROM Events INNER JOIN Attendees ON Events.event_id = Attendees.event_id GROUP BY Events.event_id
SELECT event_name, author_name FROM Events INNER JOIN Books ON Events.event_id = Books.author_id INNER JOIN Authors ON Books.author_id = Authors.author_id

SELECT event_name, attendee_name, signing_date FROM Events INNER JOIN Signings ON Events.event_id = Signings.event_id INNER JOIN Attendees ON Signings.attendee_id = Attendees.attendee_id WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01'
